name: Surgical Costs Crisis
title: High Risk of Financial Ruin from Surgical Care
description: In 2022, 100% of the population in Ivory Coast faced the risk of catastrophic and impoverishing expenditure due to surgical care, highlighting a significant healthcare affordability crisis.

name: Competitive Market Challenges
title: Struggles in Implementing Market Competition Services
description: As of 2024, Ivory Coast scored 23.07 in implementing key services promoting market competition, indicating room for improvement in fostering a competitive business environment.
